review_details: We spent a very nice day on the sea. We caught lots of tuna, Giannis knows well the good places. He was also very helpful and made a fantastic lunch for us.
Great sea food and traditional greek cuisine. Very nice atmosphee and excellent service. I would come back again.

We had a lovely stay, Lis and Graham are fantastic and very helpful hosts. They recommended us brilliant activities which were truly one of a kind. The old house is perfect and comfortable with beautiful little details. The breakfast was always very fresh and tasty with various options, the whole family loved it! Their dog, Max is adorable and well-behaved. We'd recommend staying here and we're looking forward to be back soon.
